mapper.select: SELECT employeeNo, employeeName FROM employee ORDER BY employeeNo ASC
SELECT u.userNo, u.userName, u.phone1, u.phone2, u.phone3, u.possessNum, u.ptPossessNum, e.employeeName FROM user u LEFT JOIN employee e ON u.FK_user_employee = e.employeeNo ORDER BY u.userNo DESC;

SELECT u.userNo, u.userName, u.age, u.phone1, u.phone2, u.phone3, u.regDate, u.possessNum, u.ptPossessNum, u.FK_user_point, e.employeeName FROM user u LEFT JOIN employee e ON u.FK_user_employee = e.employeeNo WHERE userNo = #{no} ORDER BY u.userNo DESC;
SELECT l.lockerNo, l.lockerRegDate, l.lockerDdate FROM user u JOIN locker l ON u.FK_user_locker = l.lockerNo WHERE userNo = #{no}
SELECT infoRegDate, regType, regPoint FROM regInfo WHERE FK_regInfo_user = #{no} ORDER BY regNo DESC;

SELECT e.employeeName, p.ptNo, p.ptRegDate, p.ptPurpose, p.FK_pt_point, p.ptTotalNum FROM pt p JOIN employee e ON p.FK_pt_employee = e.employeeNo WHERE p.FK_pt_user = #{FK_pt1_user} ORDER BY ptNo DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO regInfo(infoRegDate, regType, regPoint, FK_regInfo_user) VALUES(SYSDATE(), #{regType}, #{regPoint}, #{FK_regInfo_user})

INSERT INTO pt(FK_pt_user, FK_pt_point, ptTotalNum, FK_pt_employee, ptPurpose, ptRegDate) VALUES(#{FK_pt_user}, #{FK_pt_point}, #{ptTotalNum}, ( SELECT employeeNo FROM employee WHERE employeeName = #{employeeName}), #{ptPurpose}, SYSDATE());
